Docs.summary: A collection of links, representing subsequences of text and the entity types (phone number, address, url, etc) they may be.

remarks.para: A collection of links, representing subsequences of text and the entity types (phone number, address, url, etc) they may be.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Function Apply (text As ISpannable, applyStrategy As ApplyStrategy, spanFactory As IFunction) As ApplyStatusCode

public: Android::Views::TextClassifiers::ApplyStatusCode Apply(Android::Text::ISpannable ^ text, Android::Views::TextClassifiers::ApplyStrategy applyStrategy, Java::Util::Functions::IFunction ^ spanFactory);
public Android.Views.TextClassifiers.ApplyStatusCode Apply (Android.Text.ISpannable text, Android.Views.TextClassifiers.ApplyStrategy applyStrategy, Java.Util.Functions.IFunction? spanFactory);

.method public hidebysig instance valuetype Android.Views.TextClassifiers.ApplyStatusCode Apply(class Android.Text.ISpannable text, valuetype Android.Views.TextClassifiers.ApplyStrategy applyStrategy, class Java.Util.Functions.IFunction spanFactory) cil managed

Docs.param: the text to apply the links to. Must match the original text
the apply strategy used to determine how to apply links to text. e.g TextLinks#APPLY_STRATEGY_IGNORE
a custom span factory for converting TextLinks to TextLinkSpans. Set to null to use the default span factory.
Docs.summary: Annotates the given text with the generated links.
Docs.returns: a status code indicating whether or not the links were successfully applied e.g. #STATUS_LINKS_APPLIED

remarks.para: Annotates the given text with the generated links. It will fail if the provided text doesn't match the original text used to create the TextLinks.
NOTE: It may be necessary to set a LinkMovementMethod on the TextView widget to properly handle links. See TextView#setMovementMethod(MovementMethod)
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Do not replace ClickableSpans that exist where the TextLinkSpan needs to be applied to.

remarks.para: Do not replace ClickableSpans that exist where the TextLinkSpan needs to be applied to. Do not apply the TextLinkSpan.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.
